text: Ryuichi Obata (born 9 February 1955) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics, the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ryuichi Obata
